attributes.action: Despite what was said on Question Time we, the people, simply do not want jihadists to be allowed back in.
attributes.additional_details: Why should UK taxpayers bear the cost of British citizens who choose to ally themselves with another country or cause being prosecuted in this country? We, those taxpayers, say they should NOT be allowed back into the country.  Ask us in a referendum, if you have a fear of properly representing your electorate without having a mandate.
